name: Video Easel
overview: Video Easel is an early drawing game that allows the player to create a basic design. The computer AI then expands on this and continually creates ever evolving graphics much like a screen saver might look like. It will continue forever, or until you reset to create a new image for the computer to run away with. While this is essentially an educational drawing game, it's actually considered by many as one of the biggest inspirations of the 8-bit Demoscene.
